metadata.name: Agent Skills Evaluation Suite
metadata.description: Evaluation framework aligned with Agent Skills specification and OpenAI eval-skills
metadata.author: OpenClaw Community

evals.name: Outcome Goals
evals.description: Is the skill structurally complete per the Agent Skills specification?

criteria.name: Name Matches Directory
criteria.description: Name must match parent directory (per spec)

criteria.name: Has Body Content
criteria.description: Markdown body with instructions after frontmatter

criteria.name: Has Optional Directories
criteria.description: scripts/, references/, or assets/ per spec

evals.name: Process Goals
evals.description: Does the skill provide enough information for agents to invoke it correctly?

criteria.name: Name Spec Compliant
criteria.description: Name follows Agent Skills spec (kebab-case, 1-64 chars)

criteria.name: Description Complete
criteria.description: Describes both what the skill does and when to use it

criteria.name: Has Usage Guidance
criteria.description: Body includes when/how to use guidance

criteria.name: Clear Instructions
criteria.description: Step-by-step instructions, code blocks, or examples

evals.name: Style Goals
evals.description: Does the skill follow coding conventions and documentation standards?

criteria.name: Modular Structure
criteria.description: scripts/, references/, assets/, lib/, or src/

evals.name: Efficiency Goals
evals.description: Did it complete without thrashing or excessive resource usage?

evals.name: Security Assessment
evals.description: Evaluates security posture - no hardcoded secrets, safe execution patterns

criteria.name: No Hardcoded Secrets
criteria.description: No API keys, passwords, tokens in source

criteria.name: Safe Shell Commands
criteria.description: No unsafe string interpolation in exec()

criteria.name: No Eval Usage
criteria.description: No dangerous eval() or new Function()

criteria.name: File Permissions
criteria.description: No dangerous chmod 777 or chown root

criteria.name: Dependency Security
criteria.description: Has lock file for pinned versions
